---
title: "/mine"

<!-- This file is generated by scripts/wiki/renderCommandsDoc.ts. -->

[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Send your minion to mine things.

**Usage**

- `/mine name:<string> [quantity:<integer>] [powermine:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The thing you want to mine. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity you want to mine (optional). | - |
| `powermine` | `boolean` | No | Set this to true to powermine. Higher xp/hour, No loot (default false, optional). | - |

**Examples**

- `/mine name:Runite ore`
